Actively participated in the development. He was responsible for the creation and support of the server part, from architecture design to the deployment of the final solution. His work included development of APIs for interaction between the client part and the server, which allowed to ensure stable and fast operation of the platform even under high loads.
Занимался настройкой серверов, оптимизац: He was involved in server configuration, performance optimization, and implementation of DevOps practices. His contribution to the security of the project is also worth mentioning: he implemented data protection mechanisms and encryption.
Благодаря его усилиям, команда смогла бы: Through his efforts, the team was able to implement key functions quickly and efficiently.
Занимался вёрсткой сайтов и подготовкой: Engaged in website layout and layout preparation.
